name: Daily Activity Logger
description: Built to simplify daily task tracking and monthly work report generation. Originally developed during an industrial attachment to streamline workflow, it allows users to log tasks effortlessly and generate compiled reports for supervisors.

name: Multiviewer
description: A local network media server solution. It allows a 'parent' computer to expose a directory of films to any device on the network. Features peer-to-peer control capabilities, allowing permitted clients to take control of the playback on the server. Ideal for local movie nights and synchronized viewing.
